   contain the root `toctree` directive.

=====================================
Welcome to detectCOs's documentation!
=====================================


**detectCOs** is a Python tool designed for detecting crossover positions from genotype-by-sequencing data. For more information about chromosomal crossovers, refer to `Wikipedia <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chromosomal_crossover>`_. 

.. note::

   This project is under active development.
   
Check out the :doc:`usage` section for further information, including instructions on how to :ref:`install <installation>` and :ref:`initiate <launchment>` the project.
   


Contents
========

   config_detectCOs_CG
   detectCOs_required_functions
   detectCOs_read_files
   detectCOs_sliding_window
   detectCOs_identifyCOs
   test_detectCOs_polyrec_functions
   Test_yaml_detectCOs_BC
